name: cssobj
description: CSS in JS solution, dynamically change and update stylesheet rules at runtime, CSSOM, localize class names, auto vendor prefixer, media query hook, styled components.

scripts.report: cd dist && gzip < cssobj.min.js > cssobj.min.gz && ls -lh && rm -f *.gz
scripts.build: git rev-parse HEAD > .commithash && rollup -c && uglifyjs dist/cssobj.iife.js -cm -o dist/cssobj.min.js

author: James Yang <jamesyang999@gmail.com>
